thread.title: KA
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by KA

author: KA
title: KA
text: I've now bought a bistro table set, a couch/loveseat set, and a dining set from Home Zone, over the course of several years. I've always enjoyed the shopping experience, felt like I got a good deal every time, and I've been very happy with the furniture. Rey helped me with my most recent purchase, and he was superb.
